ssot__SurveyQuestionSection__dlm.name: Survey Question Section
ssot__SurveyQuestionSection__dlm.description: The Survey Question Section DMO represents a section in a survey, such as the title or multiple choice selections.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__DisplayOrderNumber__c.description: The display order value of the survey question section.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the survey question section.

ssot__Last ModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__Name__c.description: The name of the survey question section.

ssot__SurveyPageId__c.description: A reference ID to the survey page for the section.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the survey question section DMO.

ssot__SurveyVersionId__c.description: A reference ID to the survey version of the section.
